text:
Message 3556 of 4024
Yes bringing temperature down would be healthy.
I am uncomfortable chatting at this time but thank you for the offer.
Sent:07/11/2024 at 11:21 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 07/11/2024 at 11:21 AM)
Subject:Re: Truce?
Message 3557 of 4024
Everything condition you set, makes it worse. Always. You are never comfortable. You always make it worse. I can’t think of a single time when you
said “yes I’m comfortable bringing the temperature down.”
When I see you insisting that we do the one thing that has made this intolerable and intractable that lets me know that you are in no mood to
cooperate and you are only gonna continue to escalate things.
This has gone on for months now. We have tons of emails with me asking for this. If you have a change of heart and actually want to work with me
and bring the temperature down, let me know. This is not it.
Sent:07/11/2024 at 11:24 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/11/2024 at 11:30 AM)
Subject:Re: Truce?
Message 3558 of 4024
Please read my response.
I clearly said yes to bringing temperature down.
If bringing temperature down only happens if we chat, that is an ultimatum on your part that It appears I must agree to.
It is unclear what you are saying if I don’t chat.
Yes bring temperature down.
Sent:07/11/2024 at 11:38 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 07/11/2024 at 11:38 AM)
Subject:Re: Truce?
Message 3559 of 4024
I read your response. It’s the same response I have seen for the last year. Actions speak louder than words. Doing the same thing over and over and
expecting a different response is insanity. This does not work, never has, and only makes things worse.
I got it
Sent:07/11/2024 at 11:41 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/11/2024 at 12:42 PM)
Subject:Re: Truce?
